participant_1.name: Jenna Lee
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, Jenna loves to share her passion for music and the outdoors.
participant_1.background: i grew up in the industry. we spent summers ring at national parks. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats.

participant_2.name: Mike Johnson
participant_2.personality: Friendly and family-oriented, Mike enjoys spending quality time with his loved ones and values hard work.
participant_2.background: my wife and kids are the best. i am a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. i have three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.
